title: Re: how do you pay 4 things online?
content:
For some I've had to use a credit card, but for some it has been possible to just make a traditional money transfer/payment via my bank's internet site (gotta love this digital era..).3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"

title: Re: how do you pay 4 things online?
content:
PayPal is the most common way of paying on the net, and you can only use credit cards on PayPal. I don't have one of those.

So no, I don't buy stuff om the net. Too bad as there's some stuff out there I'd REALLY want... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: how do you pay 4 things online?
content: Since my debit card is a type only found in the UK (and it's not even that well accepted), the majority of my cash goes out of my account through PayPal. It's a pain that they charge so much, but the convenience is worth it.
